alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gaines and northwestern Dawson Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Seagraves Airport, or 10 miles east of Seagraves, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seagraves, Welch, Seagraves Airport, Loop and Punkin Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for western Texas.
